EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Univar USA distributes Jungbunzlauer's Trimagnesium Citrates
<!-- -->
Advantages of Trimagnesium Citrates
Superior Bioavailability
High Solubility
Neutral Taste
High Mineral Content
Applications of Trimagnesium Citrates
Food
Beverages
Nutritional Supplements
Pharmaceuticals
Need to add Magnesium to your product?
Univar is a distributor for Trimagnesium Citrates, Jungbunzlaur's newest additions to their product portfolio. One of the world's leading producers of citric acid, Jungbuzlaur produces two different hydration forms of trimagnesium citrates: anhydrous and nonanhydrate.
Magnesium is one of the most important minerals in the human body and Trimagnesium citrates are among the most readily absorbably magnesium salts.
